text:
Plenty of shopping options including brand names.

Plenty of food options including fast food, fusion food, food court etc

Seems like a popular shopping mall in Changi area. Very active mall which is good. Plenty of items on sale.

it's a good place, warehouse sales all the time!! the food is pretty okay here and there are just loads of shops with discounts eg. shoe shops like new balance, addidas, nike, onitsuka tiger, sketchers and clothes shop like cotton on , calvin klein, tommy hilfiger and much more!!

it's a great place if you want discounted items, theres so many more popular shops!! the food options have quite a good variety, theres alot to choose from

transport here is very connected, beside this place is also expo, changi airport terminals, jewel, changi business park and downtown line (mrt)

recommended as a tourist spot!! (if you want cheaper stuff)

The Changi City Point has many variety of shops , the basement got food like fruits shop, bakery like four leaves, old Chang kee, n many restaurants like Ajisen Raman, McDonald's, Jollibee n Texas Chicken
N many others selling clothing's for kids n ladies n men .Bata Shoes n many others.⁰

Changi City Point is a vibrant shopping destination featuring a mix of outlet stores and dining options. Open daily from 10 AM to 10 PM, it hosts popular brands like Nike, Adidas, and Charles & Keith, perfect for bargain hunters. Dining options range from casual eateries to local favorites, making it easy to take a break between shopping. The mall’s spacious layout and family-friendly atmosphere make it an enjoyable spot for both shopping and dining experiences.

Biggest and nearest to Changi Airport and attached to IT parks and Changi Business Park

Wide varieties of store collection, ranging from food to electronics. Apparels to Groceries.

This mall has one of the finest wine and liquor shops in the city.

All travellers missed shopping local food and can plan shopping and dining here as it's a few minutes away from the airport.

Now a days lot of renovation in 2025 and escalator services are also not user friendly.
